text:
It is currently not possible to create area-dependent navigation components
using the navigation framework. The major drawback is that the admin area
navigation menu is influenced by publication-specific navigation elements.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text: while this is not nice, it is not critical. punted
creator: gregor@apache.org

text: as a. kuckartz pointed out, these bugs need to stay on the radar. reopened
creator: gregor@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text:
The issue is obsolete in 1.4, because the admin area navigation does not use the
navigation framework anymore. The navigation framework is designed for website
navigation, so the bug is invalid.
